title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 05/12/2022 INC#1696

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1696; 08:58PM; 6000 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mdz7o6; #NorthHollywood; 83 Firefighters took just 46 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in a one-story discount store, that briefly threatened an adjoining restaurant. No injury. LAFD Public Information Officer (PIO) Captain Cody Weireter en route, ETA 8:30 PM. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E102 E227 E235 E239 E260 E27 E278 E289 E39 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA827 RA86 RA860 T27 T35 T39 T60 T78 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 15 16 17; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1696; 08:12PM; 6000 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mdz7o6; #NorthHollywood; PRELIM: Heavy fire within a one-story discount store, threatening a nearby restaurant.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CM42 E102 E227 E235 E239 E260 E27 E278 E289 E39 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA102 RA860 T27 T35 T39 T60 T78 T89 UR27 UR88; CH9; 15 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Brush Fire CONTROLLED - 05/12/2022 INC#1484

item.description: Update CONTROLLED - Greater Alarm Brush Fire; INC#1484; 07:45PM; 560 N Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gexo3U; #SanPedro; Precise LAFD helicopter water drops helped stop forward progress of the fire, which consumed ten acres of vegetation in a rugged canyon in and near Peck Park. With 81 LAFD personnel assigned, the firefight will continue hand tools and hose lines against stubborn residual flames, that at this hour have thankfully caused no injury, no need for evacuation or structure damage. LAFD ground crews anticipate on-site mop-up and overhaul operations through the night.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM22 E101 E112 E233 E248 E264 E266 E285 E36 E38 E48 E64 E79 E85 EM13 H5 HA5 RA36 T33 T48 T64 T66 T85; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1484; 06:15PM; 560 N Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gexo3U; #SanPedro; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to one (1) acre of medium grass and brush burning in rugged terrain within Peck Park.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM22 E101 E112 E233 E248 E266 E285 E36 E38 E48 E64 E79 E85 EM13 RA36 T33 T48 T66 T85; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Brush Fire; INC#1230; 05:25PM; 2400 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/38pX5xU; #Brentwood / #SepulvedaPass; Lingering wind during the final extinguishment phase and overhaul of the earlier one-quarter (0.25) acre brush fire between Sepulveda Boulevard and southbound lanes of the San Diego (I405) Freeway, has led to several stubborn hot spots developing in volatile light-to-medium brush beyond the initial containment line; The current and ongoing work of 150 assigned LAFD personnel, including a trio of LAFD helicopters is helping to curtail fire growth (no acreage update). There have been no injuries. No structures are threatened. There are currently no evacuation warnings. #LATraffic: The closure of Sepulveda Boulevard and at least one lane of the southbound 405 Freeway in the vicinity of the fire, is anticipated until LAFD operations are complete. Motorists should anticipate congestion and delay in the area, consider an alternate route and monitor traffic reports on news radio.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC9 BP99 CM42 CW3A CW3B E108 E109 E19 E237 E288 E290 E39 E59 E71 E83 E88 E90 E93 E99 EM9 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA37 RA90 RA99 T37 T88 T90 UR88 WT88; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1230; 04:07PM; 2400 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/38pX5xU; #Brentwood; First arriving 30 LAFD ground responders took just 21 minutes to access, fully contain and extinguish one-quarter (0.25) acre of light-to-medium brush. No injury. No structures. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC9 BP99 CW3A CW3B E109 E19 E237 E288 E290 E71 E88 E90 E93 E99 EM9 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HE1 RA90 RA99 T37 T88 T90; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0291; 06:56AM; 3806 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3l5tUml; #StudioCity; Address Corrected to 3806. 38 Firefighters took 31 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn fire in a 1, 869 square-foot one-story home that contained excessive personal storage. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC9 E108 E260 E278 E482 E86 RA78 RA878 T60 T78; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue - Vehicle; INC#1436; 08:30PM; 7751 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3suYaeG; Hollywood Hills West; (Incident type updates to a Cliff Rescue) Firefighters transported lifting and extrication equipment down the cliffside via the two-line rope system and conducted the extrication operation. LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation to bring the patient up and then provide air transport to the hospital. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E278 E482 E76 E86 EM14 H2 H3 H5 HA2 HA3 HA5 HR3 RA27 RA827 RA86 RA97 RH114 T27 T78 UR27 UR88; CH8; 15 18; Margaret Stewart
